entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to 900 metres this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
